ModMetaData.name: Vanilla Animals Expanded - Patch Pack
ModMetaData.author: Andross
ModMetaData.description: Patch pack for Vanilla Animals Expanded that includes patches for A Dog Said and Combat Extended for the current releases (Livestock - Cats & Dogs). - This pack is incompatible with Thecc's VAE Livestock CE patch because it does the same thing only that this one has all the tools (body parts) patched your choice. Contains patches for: A Dog Said Combat Extended Credits: Oskar Potocki - Vanilla Animals Expanded Animal Collab Proj - Used some of their numbers
